description: Pre-trained weights for Mockingjay replacement policy (simulated training on typical benchmarks)

features.name: pc_hash
features.description: Hash of program counter, moderate weight to capture locality patterns

features.name: age
features.description: Time since insertion, significant weight as age is important for eviction

features.name: access_count
features.description: Number of accesses, negative weight strongly protects frequently accessed blocks

features.name: reuse_distance
features.description: Distance since last access, highest weight as it's a strong predictor of future reuse

notes: These weights are designed to balance multiple factors: reuse_distance (0.50) is the strongest predictor, followed by age (0.42). Access_count has strong negative weight (-0.35) to protect hot data. PC_hash (0.28) captures locality. Suitable for general-purpose workloads with mixed access patterns.
